The Minister of War was the Danish minister responsible for the administration of the Royal Danish Army.
History
The position of Minister of War was created following the end of the absolute monarchy, when the Generalty and Commissariat College () was disbanded, and power transferred to elected officials. While the Minister of War and the Minister for the Navy's positions were merged in 1905, the ministries continued to exist separately until 1950.
